title: Trees
concept: This level focuses on binary trees and BSTs — construction from input, traversals, height/depth, leaf counting, searching, insertion in BST, LCA, diameter, and level order traversal.

challenges.title: Inorder Traversal
challenges.description: Given binary tree input in form of N nodes: each line 'value left_index right_index' where -1 means no child. Print inorder traversal.

challenges.title: Count Leaf Nodes
challenges.description: Count and print number of leaf nodes in the tree (nodes with no children).

challenges.title: Height of Binary Tree
challenges.description: Height = max height of subtrees + 1. Height of leaf = 1.

challenges.title: Search in BST
challenges.description: Insert values in BST in given order then search X. Print Yes or No.

challenges.title: Insert in BST & Print Inorder
challenges.description: Insert all given N integers into BST then print inorder traversal.

challenges.title: Lowest Common Ancestor (LCA) in BST
challenges.description: Build BST with N values then find LCA of a and b. Print the LCA value.
challenges.starterCode: // while root not null, if a and b < root go left, etc.

challenges.title: Diameter of Binary Tree
challenges.description: Diameter = longest path between any two nodes (in terms of number of nodes). Print diameter.

challenges.title: Level Order Traversal (BFS)
challenges.description: Print nodes level by level using queue (root → next level → next).
challenges.starterCode: // queue push root, pop and push children
